thread.title: The Latest: Police testing Odom's blood for drugs, alcohol
thread.title_full: The Latest: Police testing Odom's blood for drugs, alcohol

title: The Latest: Police testing Odom's blood for drugs, alcohol
text: > Top News The Latest: Police testing Odom's blood for drugs, alcohol Richard Hunter, media director for Dennis Hof, who owns the Love Ranch, walks in the room at the Love Ranch brothel, Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 in Crystal, Nev., were former NBA basketball player Lamar Odom was found unconscious the day before. Odom, the NBA star and reality TV personality embraced by teammates and fans for his humble approach to fame, was on life support Wednesday, his estranged wife Khloe Kardashian by his side. Odom was found unresponsive after four days at the brothel. (AP Photo/Chris Carlson)
